Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஆகூழால் தோன்றும் அசைவின்மை கைப்பொருள் போகூழால் தோன்றும் மடி.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Perseverance comes from a prosperous fate, and idleness from an adverse fate.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split image. On the left, a figure is infused with a golden light from above, showing relentless, energetic perseverance ('அசைவின்மை') as they build something magnificent.
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right, a similar figure is shrouded in a grey, heavy mist from above, succumbing to lethargy and idleness ('மடி'), with their tools lying unused and rusting.
Layered_Composition.Background: The source of the light and mist are two large, celestial gears in the cosmos, one golden (Prosperous Fate, 'ஆகூழ்') and one leaden (Adverse Fate, 'போகூழ்'), turning slowly.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual dichotomy showing how prosperous fate inspires diligence and adverse fate induces lethargy, with fate itself depicted as a cosmic mechanism.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The golden light represents the energy from a favorable fate. The grey mist symbolizes the oppressive nature of an unfavorable fate. The cosmic gears represent the workings of 'Ūzh' (Fate).
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Contrasting, deterministic, energetic vs. lethargic, profound.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Left side is bright, warm, and golden. Right side is desaturated, cold, grey, and misty.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Wide, balanced composition showing the two contrasting scenes side-by-side.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, photorealistic, with ethereal light and mist effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Strongly contrasting directional light sources from the cosmic gears.

Negative_Prompt: idle person on the left, active person on the right, modern setting, blurry, text artifacts, cartoonish.
